front.title: IEEE Guide for In-Service Use, Care, Maintenance, and Testing of Conductive Clothing for Use on Voltages up to 765 kV ac and ý 750 kV dc

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Superseded by 1067-2005. Recommendations are provided for the in-service use, care, maintenance, and electrical testing of conductive clothing, including suits, gloves, socks, and boots for use on voltages up to 765 kV ac and ý750kV dc.
